cmp: 叉 (fork/pitchfork/prong/pick/cross/intersect, to cross/be stuck, to diverge/to open (as legs))
虫 (insect/worm, an animal/an invertebrate/a worm/an insect)
mng: trouble, disturbance, rumpus, flirty, coquettish, abbr. for 離騷|离骚[Li2 Sao1], literary writings, smell of urine, foul smell, male (animal) (dialect)

exm.mng: disturbance, riot, to create a disturbance
to disturb, to cause a commotion, to harass
Sorrow at Parting, poem by Qu Yuan 屈原 in Songs of Chu 楚辭|楚辞
